DensityOfNOP[EUVI_,SZA_,theta_,z_]:=(42.120207420880476*Sec[Degree*SZA]^0.025342705115669405*(1 + 0.21884577580111775*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]])*EUVI^0.40854784213678164)/E^((-300 + z)/(55.242775991461656 - 1.4570016977285136*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 24.797761561338454*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] + 1.762279229609078*EUVI + ((9.315978260628066 + 4.975700315961093*Log[Sec[Degree*SZA]] + 20.79411320791254*Sin[Degree*Abs[theta]] - 4.878152914209785*EUVI)*(-300 + z))/300))
